content: Services can't access Balmain East Wharf due to an illegally parked vehicle in the bus turning area. Instead, services will start and terminate at Gladstone Park, Balmain. This is affecting 5 bus stops in each direction. Allow extra travel time and move to the nearest bus stop.
subtitle: Balmain East bus diversion

properties.speechText: 4 4 2 Services cannot access Balmain East Wharf due to an illegally parked vehicle in the bus turning area. Instead, services will start and terminate at Gladstone Park, Balmain. This is affecting 5 bus stops in each direction. Allow extra travel time and move to the nearest bus stop.

destination.name: Darling St near Balmain East Wharf, Balmain East

lines.name: Sydney Buses Network 442
lines.description: City QVB to Balmain East Wharf (Loop Service)
